channel.title: [PI] Help [PI]
channel.description:
1) need to change the amounts of coins you get from theiving from a stall (its not in src - models - players - skill - theiving 2) how to add a random event to PI to prevent autoclickers at theiving 3) how to make all admins unattackable by other players and they cant attack others either. 4) how to fix the smelting glitch where you can only smelt one bar at a time 5) how to change the format of PI Drop system. want to change the format to (monster id , item id , item amount, drop rarity) drop rarity 0 being every time and 1000 very rare (1 n 1000) 6) admin noclip command? 7) how to make it when you use a holy elixer on a spirit sheild it makes a blessed spirit sheild
any help with any of these would be greatly appreciated

item.title: [PI] Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I don’t code PI’s often anymore but I can help with 6 at least…

6; find your no-clip command in client.java then change “&& playerRights = 3” to “&& playerRights = 2” or something along those lines.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @giveitup giveitup
item.description:
@giveitup wrote:

  1. need to change the amounts of coins you get from theiving from a stall (its not in src - models - players - skill - theiving
  2. how to add a random event to PI to prevent autoclickers at theiving
  3. how to make all admins unattackable by other players and they cant attack others either.
  4. how to fix the smelting glitch where you can only smelt one bar at a time
  5. how to change the format of PI Drop system. want to change the format to (monster id , item id , item amount, drop rarity)
    drop rarity 0 being every time and 1000 very rare (1 n 1000)
  6. admin noclip command?
  7. how to make it when you use a holy elixer on a spirit sheild it makes a blessed spirit sheild

any help with any of these would be greatly appreciated

Read full topic
